text:
Kira Talent | Toronto, Ontario, Canada | Full-time, On-site

Experienced full-stack engineers, product UI/UX designers

https://www.kiraacademic.com/

Our mission is to help schools predict their most successful students. We're used by almost half of the top MBA programs across North America, and are quickly growing in engineering, undergraduate business and science programs. We haven't had a single school churn and we just acquired our first competitor.

Here's what we use: Python (Django), JavaScript (jQuery, RequireJS, FlightJS), Bower, MySQL, Celery, RabbitMQ, Wowza, AWS,.

Since we’re a small company (you’d be #21), we have lots of fun together! We host bi-weekly lunch & learns, beer o’clock on Friday afternoons, board game nights every few weeks and have done tons of activities outside of work (e.g. wine tasting, cottage retreat, movie nights).

My name is Konrad, and I'm one of the founders! Send me a note at konrad@kiratalent.com if you're interested!
